verses.name: Joel 2:24
verses.text: And the floors shall be full of wheat, and the fats shall overflow with wine and oil.

verses.name: Joel 2:25
verses.text: And I will restore to you the years that the locust hath eaten, the cankerworm, and the caterpiller, and the palmerworm, my great army which I sent among you.

verses.name: Joel 2:26
verses.text: And ye shall eat in plenty, and be satisfied, and praise the name of the Lord your God, that hath dealt wondrously with you: and my people shall never be ashamed.
